General.Name: ZhuZhou QianJin Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: ZhuZhou QianJin Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd researches, produces, and sells Chinese patent medicines, chemical medicines, and feminine hygiene products in China. The company offers traditional Chinese medicine products, including fuke qianjin capsules, chunru gel, buxue yimu pills and granules, fuke duanhongyin capsules, yimu granules, qianjin zhidai pills, fuke tiaojing tablets, jiawei xiaoyao pills, rupikang capsules, lingzhi syrup, xiao'er ganmao granules, fenghan ganmao granules, shujin fengshi medicinal liquor, and shiguogong medicinal liquor; and women's health derivatives, such as qianjin jingya sanitary napkin, qianjin run washing, and care series, etc. It also provides hygienic products, including gynaecological nursing, maternity pad/ maternity package, and baby nursing. In addition, the company provides ginger tea and wine. Additionally, it covers gynecology, cardiovascular system, endocrine system, nervous, antiviral, psychiatric, tonic, and other fields. ZhuZhou QianJin Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Zhuzhou, China.
